name: Build & Destroy: Hostile Cooperation
description:
Build & Destroy : Hostile Cooperation

Find a partner and choose your character : Builder or destroyer

Cooperate to survive enemies attacks by not letting the town hall get destroyed.

However, do not cooperate too much because only one of you can win.

Both have a different gameplay, one uses a mouse, the other uses the keyboard.

Credits : 

Adrien "Arias" Maginot
Lucas "Kadock" Dispensa
Mattis "Guérande" Golliet 
Yvon "UsherMay" Cocks

Music by Benjamin Migeon https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtWTS6Wdx5lED6lLu1DeImA
